name: Secret Treasures
overview: Published in 75 Spill Datatronic, based on the same original code upon which the Cavern of Riches was based. This is a text adventure where you must try to collect a number of different treasures hidden in the game world. They must be returned to their proper place. The player can move around in all directions and can pick-up and manipulate items. Simple puzzles must be solved, but there is little to no real story.
